text: It's going well so far. Claude Code + hooks + local docs + sub agents + slash commands + full headless instances of recursive Claude Code CLI . Excited to get it to a point where you can help test. Wait till you see what hooks + agents + my PROJECT_INDEX.json can do (later).
author: Eric Buess

text: It's been a while since I last posted a project, so I thought, why not open-source our internal efficiency gem, Claude Code Remote. The idea came from wanting to send a prompt to Claude to keep working even when I'm not at my computer—like during a walk, workout, or
author: Panda
